name: h3
description: Introducing the 2026 Soldier Tank Drip USSSA Drop 10 Baseball Bat, the pinnacle of innovation and performance for serious hitters. Featuring an ENORMOUS barrel profile and a game-changing, significantly widened sweet spot, this bat is scientifically developed by real hitters and genius-level engineers to deliver unmatched power and a light swing weight. Its new aerodynamic connector enhances whip and durability, making it the official metal bat of Perfect Game. With infused power technology and a new carbon fiber speed end cap, this bat is built for both power and contact hitters, offering a soft comfort tack grip and a full taper for increased control. Experience extreme power and speed, even on miss-hits, with a bat that's hotter than ever and designed to dominate the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: 7312 Trampoline Composite: Adds pop using accelerated spacers
Infused Power Tech: Enlarged sweet spot
Aerodynamic Connector: Creates extreme whip & durability
Full Taper Handle: Maximizes control & reduces hand sting
